summary: This mod add Azazel - Mage and Warrior
descriptionHtml:
============
[color=red]DESCRIPTION[/color]
============
This mod add Azazel - Mage and Warrior
Marryable , Essential , 2H weapon , Heavy Armor , Fire Magic 
[color=red]You can find his in Riften (Bee and Barb)[/color]
I hope you like it

=============
[color=red]RECOMMENDED[/color]
=============
HighResMaleMaps by Geonox


=============
[color=red]REQUIRED[/color]
=============
Apachii Sky Hair Male 1.0


=============
[color=red]INSTALLATION [/color]
=============
Setup all files to your data folder

=============
[color=red]UNINSTALLATION[/color]
=============
Delete bsa and esp files
_______________________

[color=red]CREDITS:[/color]
